content: Yeah.. The idealism that you just stew in has missed the boat for the real world. News is Breaking and does not have this Mythical sourcing you describe in La La Liberal bullshit land. What you are doing is enabling censorship through Authoritarianism. It’s completely Specious that you could ever do this, instead you’ll only let Huge Mainstream News sources through. The kind that Played ball with the DNC and Put that Muppet washed on Hot called Old man Commie Sanders through the ringer because they were on the Clinton Payroll.
